snippet: The Foreign Ministry was not amused by the State Department’s point-by-point knockdown of President Vladimir V. Putin’s assertions about Ukraine.
abstract: Russia’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs responds angrily to State Department statement titled President Putin’s Fiction: 10 False Claims About Ukraine, which rebuts series of assertions by Putin in format of a top-10 list; calls statement false and one-sided.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry was not amused by the State Department’s point-by-point knockdown of President Vladimir V. Putin’s assertions about Ukraine.
